Name: CPN Tools
Description: A tool to analyse logistics/queuing models in all types of applications.

Name: DESMO-J
Description: A framework for discrete-event simulation in Java, supporting hybrid event/process models and providing animation in 2D and 3D.

Name: PowerDEVS
Description: An integrated tool for hybrid systems modeling and simulation based on the DEVS formalism.

Name: Ptolemy II
Description: A software framework supporting experimentation with actor-oriented design.[18]

Name: SIM.JS
Description: SIM.JS is a general-purpose Discrete Event Simulation library written entirely in JavaScript. Runs in browser and a GUI-based modeling tool is supported.

Name: SimPy
Description: SimPy is a process-based discrete-event simulation framework based on standard Python.[21]

Name: Simula
Description: A programming language designed specifically for simulation.

Name: SystemC
Description: A set of C++ classes and macros which provide an event-driven simulation kernel.
